attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this country need to stand up and be counted in their protest of the implementation of law to allow council inspectors to enter your home to evaluate your council tax by checking every part of you home for improvements or in other words have you enriched your quality of life if so we will tax you for it. If you have never worked and live in other type of housing or you are an asylum seeker or refugee you need not worry, we tax those who can pay. We must stand together and not allow entry even if you are going to be prosecuted, this goverment has to learn to listen to the people of this country.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
